mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (title, contents, kakaoUrl, createTime, updateTime, fileUrl, address, status, memberId) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}, #{kakaoUrl}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{fileUrl}, #{address}, #{status}, #{mId})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, kakaoUrl = #{kakaoUrl}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, fileUrl = #{fileUrl}, address = #{address}, status = #{status}, memberId = #{mId} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, contents, kakaoUrl, createTime, updateTime, fileUrl, address, status, memberId AS mId FROM post ORDER BY createTime DESC
SELECT id, title, contents, kakaoUrl, createTime, updateTime, fileUrl, address, status, memberId AS mId FROM post WHERE status = 'REQUESTING_TRANSFER'
SELECT id, title, contents, kakaoUrl, createTime, updateTime, fileUrl, address, status, memberId AS mId FROM post WHERE status = 'TRANSFERRING'
SELECT id, title, contents, kakaoUrl, createTime, updateTime, fileUrl, address, status, memberId AS mId FROM post WHERE status = 'COMPLETED'
SELECT id, title, contents, kakaoUrl, createTime, updateTime, fileUrl, address, status, memberId AS mId FROM post WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
